trans-unit.source: Represents a security identifier (SID) and provides marshaling and comparison operations for SIDs.
trans-unit.target: 表示安全标识符 (SID)，并提供 SID 的封送和比较操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the binary form of a SID.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SID 的二进制形式的整数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> class by using an integer that represents the binary form of a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: 使用表示安全标识符 (SID) 二进制形式的整数，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问非托管的代码的功能。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: SDDL string for the SID used to create the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象的 SID 的 SDDL 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> class by using the specified security identifier (SID) in Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) format.
trans-unit.target: 使用安全说明符定义语言 (SDDL) 格式的指定安全标识符 (SID) 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The byte array that represents the SID.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SID 的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset to use as the starting index in <c>binaryForm</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要用作 <c>binaryForm</c> 中的起始索引的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> class by using a specified binary representation of a security identifier (SID).
trans-unit.target: 使用安全标识符 (SID) 的指定二进制表示形式初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: This value must not be <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.WellKnownSidType.LogonIdsSid" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值不得为 <see cref="F:System.Security.Principal.WellKnownSidType.LogonIdsSid" />。

trans-unit.source: The domain SID.
trans-unit.target: 域 SID。

trans-unit.source: This value is required for the following <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WellKnownSidType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 以下 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WellKnownSidType" /> 值需要此值。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is ignored for any other <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WellKnownSidType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.WellKnownSidType" /> 值都忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> class by using the specified well known security identifier (SID) type and domain SID.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的已知安全标识符 (SID) 类型和域 SID 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns the account domain security identifier (SID) portion from the SID represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object if the SID represents a Windows account SID.
trans-unit.target: 如果由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的 SID 表示 Windows 帐户 SID，则从该 SID 返回帐户域安全标识符 (SID) 部分。

trans-unit.source: If the SID does not represent a Windows account SID, this property returns <see cref="T:System.ArgumentNullException" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该 SID 不表示 Windows 帐户 SID，则此属性返回 <see cref="T:System.ArgumentNullException" />。

trans-unit.source: The account domain SID portion from the SID represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object if the SID represents a Windows account SID; otherwise, it returns <see cref="T:System.ArgumentNullException" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的 SID 表示 Windows 帐户 SID，则从该 SID 返回帐户域 SID 部分；否则，它返回 <see cref="T:System.ArgumentNullException" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the length, in bytes, of the security identifier (SID) represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的安全标识符 (SID) 的长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the SID represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的 SID 的长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Compares the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象同当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象进行比较。

trans-unit.source: A signed number indicating the relative values of this instance and <paramref name="sid" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个带符号数字，指示此实例和 <paramref name="sid" /> 的相对值。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Return Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 返回值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> 小于零

trans-unit.source: </term><description> This instance is less than <paramref name="sid" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 此实例小于 <paramref name="sid" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 零

trans-unit.source: </term><description> This instance is equal to <paramref name="sid" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 此实例等于 <paramref name="sid" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 大于零

trans-unit.source: </term><description> This instance is greater than <paramref name="sid" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 此实例大于 <paramref name="sid" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象是否与指定的对象相等。

trans-unit.source: An object to compare with this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象比较的对象，或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象是否与指定的对象相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is an object with the same underlying type and value as this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是与此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象有相同基础类型和值的对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象是否等于当前的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of <paramref name="sid" /> is equal to the value of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="sid" /> 的值和当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象的值相等，则为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The byte array to receive the copied SID.
trans-unit.target: 要接收复制的 SID 的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset to use as the starting index in <c>binaryForm</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要用作 <c>binaryForm</c> 中的起始索引的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Copies the binary representation of the specified security identifier (SID) represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> class to a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 类表示的指定安全标识符 (SID) 的二进制表示形式复制到一个字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 用作当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象的哈希函数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.GetHashCode" /> method is suitable for hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.GetHashCode" /> 方法适合在哈希算法和类似哈希表的数据结构中使用。

trans-unit.source: A hash value for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象的哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the security identifier (SID) represented by this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object is a valid Windows account SID.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示由此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的安全标识符 (SID) 是否为有效的 Windows 帐户 SID。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the SID represented by this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object is a valid Windows account SID; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的 SID 为有效 Windows 帐户 SID，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The SID to compare with this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象进行比较的 SID。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the security identifier (SID) represented by this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object is from the same domain as the specified SID.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示由此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的安全标识符 (SID) 是否与指定 SID 同属一个域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the SID represented by this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object is in the same domain as the <paramref name="sid" /> SID; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的 SID 与 <paramref name="sid" /> SID 同属一个域，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The type being queried for validity to serve as a conversion from <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: 查询其能否作为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 的有效转换类型的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following target types are valid:
trans-unit.target: 以下目标类型是有效的：

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified type is a valid translation type for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示指定类型是否为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 类的有效转换类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="targetType" /> is a valid translation type for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="targetType" /> 为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 类的有效转换类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A value to compare with the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个要与 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象进行比较的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object matches the specified well known security identifier (SID) type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象是否与指定的已知安全标识符 (SID) 类型匹配。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="type" /> is the SID type for the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="type" /> 为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象的 SID 类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum size, in bytes, of the binary representation of the security identifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回安全标识符的二进制表示形式的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the minimum size, in bytes, of the binary representation of the security identifier.
trans-unit.target: 返回安全标识符的二进制表示形式的最小大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The left operand to use for the equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 用于相等比较的左操作数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The right operand to use for the equality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 用于相等比较的右操作数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> objects to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: They are considered equal if they have the same canonical representation as the one returned by the <see cref="P:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.Value" /> property or if they are both <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果这两个对象具有与 <see cref="P:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.Value" /> 属性返回的规范表示形式相同的规范表示形式，或是二者都为 <see langword="null" />，则将它们视为相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="left" /> 和 <paramref name="right" /> 相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The left operand to use for the inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 用于不相等比较的左操作数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The right operand to use for the inequality comparison.
trans-unit.target: 用于不相等比较的右操作数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> objects to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象以确定它们是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: They are considered not equal if they have different canonical name representations than the one returned by the <see cref="P:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.Value" /> property or if one of the objects is <see langword="null" /> and the other is not.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们的规范名称表示形式与 <see cref="P:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.Value" /> 属性返回的表示形式不同，或其中一个对象为 <see langword="null" /> 而另一个对象不是，它们将被视为不相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="left" /> 和 <paramref name="right" /> 不相等，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the security identifier (SID), in Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) format, for the account represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以安全说明符定义语言 (SDDL) 格式返回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的帐户的安全标识符 (SID)。

trans-unit.source: An example of the SDDL format is S-1-5-9.
trans-unit.target: S-1-5-9 就是一个 SDDL 格式。

trans-unit.source: The SID, in SDDL format, for the account represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的帐户的 SID（SDDL 格式）。

trans-unit.source: The target type for the conversion from <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 进行的转换的目标类型。

trans-unit.source: The target type must be a type that is considered valid by the <see cref="M:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.IsValidTargetType(System.Type)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 目标类型必须为由 <see cref="M:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.IsValidTargetType(System.Type)" /> 方法视为有效的类型。

trans-unit.source: Translates the account name represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object into another <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" />-derived type.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的帐户名转换为另一 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 派生的类型。

trans-unit.source: The converted identity.
trans-unit.target: 转换后的标识。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="targetType" /> is not an <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="targetType" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: Some or all identity references could not be translated.
trans-unit.target: 未能转换部分或所有标识引用。

trans-unit.source: A Win32 error code was returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回了一个 Win32 错误代码。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to manipulate the principal object.
trans-unit.target: 操作的主体对象的功能。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlPrincipal" />

trans-unit.source: Returns an uppercase Security Descriptor Definition Language (SDDL) string for the security identifier (SID) represented by this <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回由此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的安全标识符 (SID) 的安全说明符定义语言 (SDDL) 字符串（全部大写）。

trans-unit.source: An uppercase SDDL string for the SID represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 对象表示的 SID 的 SDDL 字符串（全部大写）。
